items.sentence: My father doesn\'t allow me to drive unless he\'s in the car with me.
I could\'ve gone to the seaside, but I went to the mountains instead.
I didn\'t want to cancel the appointment, but something else came up.
I don\'t care who your father is. You still have to follow my orders.
I don\'t have enough money on me right now to pay you what I owe you.
